item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
Cannot recall all the details, but I'm pretty sure the multi-cores machines didn't give me exciting results.
Anyway, being away from Cassandra for quite something, it should have some improvement I believe, so you are on your own to do some more tests. ;-)
item.content:encoded:
Cannot recall all the details, but I’m pretty sure the multi-cores machines didn’t give me exciting results.

Anyway, being away from Cassandra for quite something, it should have some improvement I believe, so you are on your own to do some more tests. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Lei wang
item.dc:creator: Lei wang
item.description: hello, how about the multicore experiment's result? I have done similar experiments in single multicore node. I found the maximum concurrency is 3 for cassandra, and i don't know why. If you are interested, can you contact me through email?
item.content:encoded:
hello, how about the multicore experiment’s result?
I have done similar experiments in single multicore node.
I found the maximum concurrency is 3 for cassandra, and i don’t know why. If you are interested, can you contact me through email?

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Those powerful machines are running really old releases of all sorts of software, I tried some workaround to get things working, but the performance is not that exciting, will try some more tests.
item.content:encoded: Those powerful machines are running really old releases of all sorts of software, I tried some workaround to get things working, but the performance is not that exciting, will try some more tests.
